<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cantorian Restoration](/Feats.aspx?ID=5587) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
A living creature within 60 feet would die.

</column>

---

The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times. You prevent the creature from dying and restore 6d8 + your Constitution modifier Hit Points to it. You can't use Cantorian Restoration if the triggering effect was a [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effect or an effect that leaves no remains, such as [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1492).
name: Cantorian Restoration
